      Data formatter for dates (less time).

      Data formatter for double values.

      Data formatter for Long values.

      Methods in org.xandercat.pmdb.util.format with parameters of type DataFormatter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds an attribute formatter for the given attribute name.
      void DataFormatters.setGenericFormatter(DataFormatter genericFormatter)
      Sets the generic formatter that will be used to format values when no explicit formatter for an attribute has been set.
